entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:25 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -38.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 7:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -38.4°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -43.0°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Ice fog patches developing after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
